item.value: The tallest building in America is the Willius Tower in Chicago.
The Population of the Earth is about 6,800,000,000 (6.80 billion). China has the most people, its population is 1.3 billion.
The blue whale can produce the loudest sound of any living animal. The sound can be detected as far away as 530 miles.
The longest word in a major English dictionary is 'Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis'. It is 45 characters long.
Sneezing with your eyes open is impossible
The earth is the 3rd planet from the sun and is the 5th largest planet in our solar system. Jupiter is the largest planet.
The explosion of Mount Tambora in Indonesia in 1815 has been called the loudest sound ever heard by humans.
A sneeze generates a wind of 166 km/hr (100 mi/hr), and a cough moves out at 100 km/hr (60 mi/hr).

The Cheetah is the fastest land animal. It can run at 112 kilometres per hour (70 mph). The average person can run from 12 - 17 miles an hour in sprints, so keep away from cheetahs.
There are more than 2,700 languages in the world.
The earliest dated printed book is the "Diamond Sutra", printed in China almost 3,000 thousand years ago.
The moon is just over one quarter the size of the earth.
The moon is 384,400 km from earth. If you travelled to the Moon in a plane it would take about 16 days. It takes 3 days in a spaceship to get there.
The shortfin Mako shark is the fastest fish.
The world's oldest person was Kama Chinen. She lived in the Japanese island of Okinawa. She died a week before her 115th birthday. She was born on May 10, 1895.
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is thirteen seconds
Roughly 70 percent of an adult's body is made up of water.
In the Summer of 1896 the first modern Olympics was held in Athens, Greece. The 2012 Olympics will be held in London.
The biggest earthquake ever recorded occurred in Chile, in 1960. Known as the Great Chilean Earthquake, the quake measured 9.5 on the Richter scale.
